## [4.59.0](https://github.bmc.com/bmc-ux/adapt-css/compare/v4.58.4...v4.59.0) (2020-08-12)


### ⚠ BREAKING CHANGES

* **adapt-table:** "scrollHeight" input was changed.
Now values that contains "%" or "calc" are no longer supported.
To stretch table height on whole parent container please use "flex" value.
More information can be found here - https://www.primefaces.org/primeng/showcase/#/table/scroll

* feat(adapt-table): revert back styles for ag-grid

* centered empty icon when data is empty
